name: 3.4.1.39. Visiting Celebrity (Settlement)

cf.path: Map Notes#/CF_SEP/PFRPG - Kingdom Building - GM Version

content: A celebrity from another kingdom visits one of your settlements, causing a sudden influx of other visitors and spending. Fame increases by 1 and Treasury increases by 1d6 BP (each time you roll a 6, add the result to the total and roll again).
